recipesJson.name: Rice Crispy Treats Plain
recipesJson.author: MACHiNEFiSH
recipesJson.description: I've been trying to find this recipe but decided to try to create it myself so this is my first real attempt to clone a flavor. I'm guessing two week steep. I'm not sure if it'll work so please send suggestions.

reviews.text: I didn't get rice crispy treats with this so much as I got sweet rice crispies cereal with a fluffy mouthfeel.  It's still a tasty recipe if you like rice crispies, and this is a solid first attempt.  FA Meringue at 0.5-1% might help to emulate that sticky goo that holds the cereal together a little more strongly.
